mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDINFO2 ( BOARDSEQ, ID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, HITCOUNT, INDATE, FILENAME, FILENAME_ORG ) VALUES ( BOARDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, 0, sysdate, #{fileName}, #{fileName_org} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARDSEQ, ID, BOARDTITLE, HITCOUNT, INDATE FROM BOARDINFO2
SELECT BOARDSEQ, ID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, HITCOUNT, INDATE FROM BOARDINFO2 WHERE BOARDSEQ=#{boardSeq}
